question: Which Indian bank co-launched a Contactless debit card along with Japan's JCB International?
explanation:
State Bank of India has partnered with National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) and Japan's JCB International Co to launch new 'SBI RuPay JCB Platinum Contactless Debit Cardâ€™.
This card has a dual interface feature, under which customers can use it for both contact and contactless transactions, both in the domestic market as well as overseas. The card has been launched on the RuPay network.
